response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest standards. This product holds immense value to both us and you, with an estimated worth of $1,200,000. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $995,000, a significant discount that reflects our commitment to rewarding early adopters and long-term partners.

By accepting this offer, you will not only secure a valuable asset but also benefit from exclusive access to future updates, personalized support, and a community of like-minded individuals who share your passion for excellence. We believe that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, contributing to your success and enhancing your experience in ways that are unparalleled.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional opportunity. We look forward to the possibility of working closely with you and contributing to your endeavors.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 995000}
